input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Pedal Mafia"
Reference Product Name: "Core Jersey White/Black"
Reference Product Description:
The all-new Core Jersey is a high-quality staple for cyclists in pursuit of optimal comfort and durability. Our sustainable manufacturing process has evolved to incorporate recycled yarns, while the ultra-soft knitted fabric provides superior durability and form-fitting compression for all body types. Lightweight construction enhances the freedom of movement, and advanced moisture-wicking technology regulates body temperature during intense rides. With three convenient rear pockets and a zipper-secured storage pocket, youâ€™ll have ample space to stow your riding essentials. Arriving in five new colourways, the reimagined CORE Jersey is a must-have addition to your cycling wardrobe.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Pactimo Men's Relaxed Fit Bike Jersey'
  - Name='Pactimo Men's Trail-Ready & Quick-Dry MTB Jersey'
  - Name='Sportful Flanders Classic Jersey'
  - Name='Santini RTR Unisex Jersey'
  - Name='Santini Uci World Champion Short Sleeve Jersey Man'
  - Name='Santini Ombra Eco Micro Polartec Jersey'
  - Name='Pactimo Men's Summit Aero Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Pactimo Columbine Men's Ultra-Breathable Mesh Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Pactimo Men's Flyte Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Pactimo Men's Long Sleeve Cargo Jersey'
  - Name='GORE WEAR Men's Spirit Stripes Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Gore Wear C5 Kit'
  - Name='Santini Note Jersey Man'
  - Name='Santini Squadra Corse 2025 Unisex Jersey'
  - Name='Pactimo Men's Geo Mesh Ultra-Breathable Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Pactimo Men's Ultra-Light Sleek Aero Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Women's Cycling Pro Vapour Jersey'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Core Long Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='Vis Red Men's Core Jersey'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Men's Base Layer'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Pro Thermal Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Pro Vapour Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Pro Delta Bib'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Men's Thermal Cycling Core Vest'
  - Name='Nomadic Tech Long Sleeve Cycling Jersey'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo Men's Relaxed Fit Bike Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a bike jersey but with a relaxed fit, likely less compression and different fabric focus than the form-fitting, ultra-soft, compression Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo Men's Trail-Ready & Quick-Dry MTB Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: An MTB-specific quick-dry jersey; while also cycling apparel, it targets a different discipline with possibly more durable or loose fit, contrasting with the Core Jersey's road style compression fit.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sportful Flanders Classic Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A classic cycling jersey similar in use and likely close in fit and fabric to the Core Jersey, both designed for comfort and durability on road rides.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Santini RTR Unisex Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Unisex cycling jersey from a known cycling brand, likely similar features such as compression fit and moisture-wicking, comparable to the Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Santini Uci World Champion Short Sleeve Jersey Man
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A high-performance short sleeve cycling jersey with likely similar construction and moisture-wicking capability, but tailored for elite racing which may differ in fit or fabric weight.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Santini Ombra Eco Micro Polartec Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Contains Polartec fabric and possibly designed for cooler temperatures, differs from the lightweight, warm weather Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo Men's Summit Aero Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: An aero-focused cycling jersey similar in function and fit to the Core Jersey, likely form-fitting and high-performance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo Columbine Men's Ultra-Breathable Mesh Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Ultra-breathable mesh jersey designed for high ventilation, somewhat different construction from the Core Jersey but serves a similar cycling purpose.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo Men's Flyte Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A road cycling jersey likely similar in terms of fit, fabric quality, and moisture-wicking properties like the Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo Men's Long Sleeve Cargo Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long sleeve and cargo pockets indicate a different silhouette and usage, less directly comparable although both are cycling jerseys.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: GORE WEAR Men's Spirit Stripes Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: High-quality cycling jersey from a recognized technical brand, likely with comparable fit, materials, and features to the Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Gore Wear C5 Kit
scores_with_rationales.rationale: 'C5 Kit' suggests a set of cycling apparel including jersey; if specifically the jersey is included, it might be similar in use but the name is less specific about just the jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Santini Note Jersey Man
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Road cycling jersey likely comparable in function but maybe differing in fabric or fit details, still relevant to the Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Santini Squadra Corse 2025 Unisex Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A new model of unisex road cycling jersey, probably similar in technical features and intended use as the Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo Men's Geo Mesh Ultra-Breathable Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Designed for ultra-breathability with mesh material, which is a different fabric focus but still a cycling jersey for similar purpose.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo Men's Ultra-Light Sleek Aero Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: High-performance aero cycling jersey very likely to share key characteristics like compression fit, lightweight fabric, and moisture management with the Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Women's Cycling Pro Vapour Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand, similar technical cycling jersey for women; similar fabric and function but gender-specific cut might differ slightly.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Core Long Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and line with a long sleeve variant of the Core Jersey; very closely related product with similar fabric and features except sleeve length.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Vis Red Men's Core Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Shares name 'Core Jersey' but from different brand and details unknown; may have similar purpose but lesser brand/feature alignment.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Men's Base Layer
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A base layer is fundamentally different from a jersey in use and construction; worn underneath rather than as a standalone cycling top.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Pro Thermal Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Thermal bib shorts are cycling bottoms, unrelated in silhouette and use to a short sleeve cycling jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Pro Vapour Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Bib shorts are distinct from jerseys in form and function; while cycling apparel from same brand, not directly comparable.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Pro Delta Bib
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A bib short variant, very different product category from a cycling jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Men's Thermal Cycling Core Vest
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Vest is outerwear layer distinct from jersey but may share fabric tech; less relevant due to different silhouette and intended layering use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nomadic Tech Long Sleeve Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long sleeve cycling jersey likely comparable in purpose and technical features but different sleeve length and possibly fabric composition.
